text: Hi All - My name is Nicole and I work for a remote HubSpot Partner Agency in San Diego, CA called Chief Martech Officer (www.chiefmartechofficer). I'm new to the developer community and just took my HubSpot CMS certification test and passed. Im a marketer and content creator, but hoping to learn more about development :slightly_smiling_face:

Hey HubSpot peeps! I'm Will Franklyn, new to building websites through HubSpot. I am a software developer but currently working as a web developer for a company called BetterRx (<http://www.betterrx.com|www.betterrx.com>). Here to learn and make connections!
